mapper.select: INSERT INTO items (name, price, descript, pict, status, created) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{descript}, #{pict}, 'ACT', NOW())
SELECT * FROM items WHERE status = 'ACT' LIMIT #{offset}, #{num}

SELECT admins.id, admins.name, admins.userId, items.id AS itemId, items.name AS itemName, items.price, items.descript, items.pict FROM items JOIN admins ON admins.userId = items.buyer WHERE items.buyer = #{buyer}
